contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
In XbyK is it possible to construct an email, based on an email template in an email channel, via the XbyK API and put this email in the email queue to be sent out?
The requirement is to pull in data from an external system and send that data in an email from XbyK. We cannot store the data from the external system in the XbyK database.
---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version: [27.0.0] - .NET version: [6] - Deployment environment: [Azure] - Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.xperience.io/xp/developers-and-admins/configuration/email-configuration)
